snippet: The Midwest gives him a chance to prove why he would have been a stronger not-Romney alternative than Gingrich.
abstract: The Midwest gives him a chance to prove why he would have been a stronger not-Romney alternative than Gingrich.
lead_paragraph: Looking at the polling for the run of Midwestern primaries and caucuses to come, my colleague Nate Silver writes today that Rick Santorum is "a more dangerous opponent for Mr. Romney than Mr. Gingrich at this point."
